short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an additional bar to Codecademy User Profile pages to indicate best streaks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension delivers the much requested Codecademy User Best Streak bar to all Codecademy User Profile Pages.


Update 1.0.1: Bug Fixes
Update 1.0.2: New icon
Update 1.0.3: Added GitHub repo
